title: AHS Hotel: The Best of Lady Gaga
author: GameSpot Universe
comment: She and Liz Taylor carried this season. Periodt.
I don't care what everyone says, this season is aesthetic pleasure, i love
Lady Gaga is the kid at school who is good at everything. She can act, sing, and dance really well. I wouldn't be surprised if she knew how to do trapeze.
I can't imagine Elizabeth being played by anyone else but Lady Gaga.

"you murdered me!"
"oh get over it you pissed me off" 
😭😭😭😭😭😭
description:
Lady Gaga is not only a singer, songwriter, dancer, philanthropist, and fashion designer; she’s also a Golden Globe award-winning actress for her role as Elizabeth Johnson (a.k.a The Countess) in American Horror Story: Hotel. 

The Countess, though very fashionable, is quite deadly. She uses her stylish chain mail glove in her blood-enticed murders. As owner of Hotel Cortez, she uses the hotel as a tool to lure in her unsuspecting victims. 

After her forbidden love with Rudolph and Natacha came to an unsettling end, the newly transformed vampire set her eyes on other targets. She took in characters such as Liz Taylor, Holden, and Donovan for her own personal desires. 

Though she may appear to be cold-hearted on the outside, as a human she was filled with love. But now her love has changed due to heartbreak. Her lovers must take her as their one and only true love or be forced suffer the consequences like Ramona.

We compiled our favorite moments from Lady Gaga's Season 5 performance!

Subscribe to GameSpot Universe!
